entry.title: MP: exception caught with cause com.sap.engine.services.jndi.persistent.exceptions720 in PI/PO
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
We are facing an issue in SAP PI/PO where the message is processed successfully and delivered to the target system, but the sender receives an HTTP 500 error. In the logs we see the following:

MP: exception caught with cause com.sap.engine.services.jndi.persistent.exceptions720.NameNotFoundException: Object not found in lookup of NamespaceMapperBean.

Even though message delivery is successful, this exception still appears and causes the user to see a 500 Internal Server Error.

Thanks!

entry.title: Update VA02 ATP simulation schedule line from Z-program problem
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Please tell me how to do with the problem I face below.

The Z-program need to update the new schedule lines as VA02 ATP result in SO item when the user trigger a condition in a user exit.

I can get the VA02 ATP simulation from SD_SALESDOCUMENT_CHANGE

-SCHEDULE_EX.

The problem is if the user set the flag of the complete delivery after a DN created for the partial quantity, and then if I use FMs like SD_BACKORDER_UPDATE or BAPI_SALESDOCUMENT_SAVE or SD_SALESDOCUMENT_CHANGE again, it shows error: "system: item 000200 for schedule line 000300 is in the work area".

There is a FM SD_SALES_DOC_CHECK_ATP can update schedule lines as delay proposal result automaticity, it works fine.

But if there is a item which has complete delivery flag, the Z-program need to choose the complete delivery, not delay proposal.


Is there any suggestion for me?

entry.title: Production Order Printout Settings
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I am facing an issue with the production order printout when creating an order in CO01:

  • After saving the order in CO01, the printout is triggered automatically, but BOM components and their quantities are not shown on the printed document, even though my print layout includes the BOM component and qty fields.

  • However, when I reprint the order using CO02, the BOM component lines and quantities do appear correctly on the printout.

This is unexpected, I need the BOM component details and their quantities to appear already at the time of order creation, i.e., during the first print after CO01 save.

I extract the data from below select query.

SELECT RSPOS,
           RESB~MATNR,
           MAKTX,
           BDMNG,
           MEINS,
           CHARG,
           LGORT,
           RESB~REVLV
         FROM AFKO INNER JOIN RESB ON AFKO~RSNUM = RESB~RSNUM AND AFKO~AUFNR = RESB~AUFNR
                     INNER JOIN MAKT ON MAKT~MATNR = RESB~MATNR AND MAKT~SPRAS = 'E'
                     INTO TABLE @LT_BOM WHERE AFKO~AUFNR = @caufvd_p_tab-AUFNR AND
                                              RESB~VORNR = @LS_AFVGD_TAB-VORNR.

Advance Thanks

entry.title: COMMIT WORK AND WAIT slows down system performances
entry.content:
Hi SAP Gurus,

My question is: I'm loop-ing an internal table having more than 20k materials in which I have to change a material master filed (MARC-NCOST). 
Using BAPI_MATERIAL_SAVEDATA and "COMMIT WORK AND WAIT" statement I encounter a very slow down of the overall system performances. 

Is it better to use COMMIT WORK only instead of  "COMMIT WORK AND WAIT" ? I've read that lock time increase and it may cause a queue in ENQUEUE and UPDATE TASK work process, is it true ?

Thank you

#ABAP #COMMITWORKANDWAIT

entry.title: Error while sending email using custom email template using ABAP program.
entry.content:
I have created an email template using CDS View and calling the email Template using ABAP and using below code to send email where I am getting " No data supplied to the template" error. Here is the Code Dump. Any suggestions?

ABAP Code:

    DATA : email_template_name TYPE smtg_tmpl_id VALUE 'ZZ1_DEMO_TEMP',
           sales_order_id TYPE VBAK-VBELN VALUE '0000000040'.


    DATA(bcs) = cl_bcs=>create_persistent( ).

    DATA(email_api) =  cl_smtg_email_api=>get_instance(
            iv_template_id = email_template_name  ).

	DATA(sales_order_cds_key) =
             VALUE if_smtg_email_template=>ty_gt_data_key(
                  ( name = 'SalesDocument'
                    value = sales_order_id ) ).

    TRY.

        " Integrate E-Mail subject and body with email instance
        email_api->render_bcs(
                  io_bcs = bcs
                 iv_language = 'E'
                  iv_language_default = 'E'
                  it_data_key =  sales_order_cds_key

                 ).


        DATA(email_receipient)  =
                   cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address(
                          'test@email.com' ).

        bcs->add_recipient(
                    EXPORTING i_recipient  = email_receipient    ).

        bcs->send( ) .

        COMMIT WORK .

      CATCH cx_bcs INTO DATA(lx_bcs).
        " Handle the exception, e.g., log or output error message
        out->write( lx_bcs->get_text( ) ).
    ENDTRY.

Code Dump

An exception has occurred in class "CX_SMTG_EMAIL_COMMON". This exception was not caught
in procedure "IF_OO_ADT_CLASSRUN~MAIN" "(METHOD)" or propagated by a RAISING clause.
Since the caller of the procedure could not have anticipated this
exception, the current program was terminated.
The reason for the exception occurring was:
The reason for the exception is:
No data supplied to render email template "ZZ1_DEMO_TEMP"

 

Information on where terminated

The termination occurred in ABAP program or include "CL_SMTG_EMAIL_RENDERER========CP", in "APPLY". The
main program was "SAPMSSY1".

In the source code, the termination point is in line 55 of include "CL_SMTG_EMAIL_RENDERER========CM001".
include "CL_SMTG_EMAIL_RENDERER========CM001".
The termination is due to exception "CX_SMTG_EMAIL_COMMON" occurring in procedure "IF_OO_ADT_CLASSRUN~MAIN" "(METHOD)",
but not being handled locally there or being declared in the RAISING
clause.
The procedure is in program "ZABAP_TEMP=============CP". Its source code begins in line 1 of
include "ZABAP_TEMP=============CM001".

entry.title: SAP RAP Fiori Freestyle Custom page cannot detect onExit
entry.content:
I'm currently working on an SAP RAP where the user can go from a List Report to a custom page. This custom page is using a Fiori Freestyle and it's mainly for filling in with custom data. I'm not using Form Entry Object Page because this is using custom entity and draft entity is not going to be used in this scenario.

The problem here is that if I were to provide input in the custom page, go back, and select another item, the data doesn't change. It stays the same and I don't know why. Does anyone have a solution to this problem?

entry.title: SHORT DUMP：OBJECTS_OBJREF_NOT_ASSIGNED_NO
entry.content:
Hi All,

I know this runtime error has been discussed by many people. However, none of the solutions applied to my problem.

My system contains a custom report that uses an Excel template on OAOR to input data and then exports it as an Excel macro file.
An error occurs every time data is inserted into an Excel cell using the following statement, instead of an error occurring in each cell.

DEFINE cell_cls.  
  IF &3 IS NOT INITIAL.

*  translate &3 to upper case.
  FREE: gt_ranges, gt_input.
  CALL METHOD r_excel->insert_range_dim
    EXPORTING
      name     = 'cell'
      no_flush = 'X'
      top      = &1
      left     = &2
      rows     = 1
      columns  = 1
    IMPORTING
      error    = r_error.

  gs_ranges-name = 'cell'.
  gs_ranges-columns = &2.
  gs_ranges-rows = &1.
  APPEND gs_ranges TO gt_ranges .
  CLEAR gs_ranges .

  gs_input-column = 1.
  gs_input-row = 1.
  gs_input-value = &3.
  APPEND gs_input TO gt_input .
  CLEAR gs_input .

  CALL METHOD r_excel->set_ranges_data
    EXPORTING
      ranges   = gt_ranges
      contents = gt_input
      no_flush = 'X'
    IMPORTING
      error    = r_error.

  ENDIF.

END-OF-DEFINITION.

The problem doesn't occur every time it's run; it only happens to some users, and it's intermittent.

But I am absolutely certain that there was data when I filled in the storage cell.

In fact, this problem occurs in two reports, with one of them even reporting an error because ADRC-NAME1 is missing, which should be impossible.

Can someone provide any possible reasons for the problem?

English is not my usual language, so please ask any questions if anything is unclear.

Thank you all for your assistance!

entry.title: cl_cte_fin_post_ccard_services=>get_ccard_nr_from_token
entry.content:
Hello Team, 

We are using the method cl_cte_fin_post_ccard_services=>get_ccard_nr_from_token to retrieve the credit card number from the given token.

However, the method is now failing with the error “http_communication_failure”.
We have checked the CONCUR RFC connection in SM59, and it is working fine, but we are not sure why the communication failure is occurring.

Error details:

http_communication_failure
CONCUR RFC
500 Native SSL error
ICM_HTTP_SSL_ERROR

Has anyone encountered this type of issue before?
Are there any prerequisites or configuration settings that should be checked?
This interface had been working for many days, and the error has started appearing suddenly.

entry.title: CDS View Slow Due to Association with C_StsObjActiveStatusCodeText
entry.content:
C_StsObjActiveStatusCodeText  this CDS is time taking (4minutes). its impact the performance 

Number of records 22million.

Why does this CDS view take several minutes to load even when the other association table is empty?

Does the association expand into a join causing a scan on C_StsObjActiveStatusCodeText?

What is the recommended way to optimize this (filtered CDS, index, explicit join, etc.)?

Any best practices for associations to large standard status tables?

Any help or guidance on how to optimize this CDS view or understand why it's slow would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: HOW TO DO SAP EWM PACKING REPACKING AND UNPACKING
entry.content:
1. Move stock from one HU to a new HU           
 2. Move stock from one HU to an existing HU          
 3. Move stock from a bin to an HU                 
4. Move stock from an HU to a bin               
 5. Move stock from a bin to a new HU 

 

***  " FOR HU TO existing HU MOVEMENT
  IF p_hu IS NOT INITIAL AND p2dest_h IS NOT INITIAL.
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->get_instance
      IMPORTING
*       es_hu_main  =                  " Structure with GLobal Fields and Indicators in Packing
        eo_instance = lo_packing. " Packing in WM with Immediately Confirmed Transfer Orders

    CALL METHOD lo_packing->init
      EXPORTING
        iv_lgnum = p_whnum "XYZ''     " Warehouse Number/Warehouse Complex
*       is_pack_controle       =                  " Structure with Fields for Packing Control
*       iv_procty              =                  " Warehouse Process Type
*       iv_execute_whr_cleanup = 'X'              " Checkbox
      EXCEPTIONS
        error    = 1                " Error, see log
        OTHERS   = 2.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*   WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4.
    ENDIF.


    CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
      EXPORTING
        iv_lgnum = p_whnum "XYZ'
*       IO_PROT  =
      .
    SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO lv_guid_hu WHERE huident = p_hu AND lgnum = p_whnum.
    SELECT SINGLE lgpla FROM /scwm/aqua INTO lv_lgpla WHERE huident = p_hu AND lgnum = p_whnum.

    CALL METHOD lo_packing->get_hu
      EXPORTING
        iv_huident = p_hu "'00000000000300000039' " Handling Unit Identification
        iv_guid_hu = lv_guid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6F319AAFCF49C0B' " Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit
*       iv_lock    =                  " Single-Character Indicator
*       iv_nlevel  =                  " Single-Character Flag
      IMPORTING
*       et_huident =
        et_huitm   = gt_huitm " Material Items in the HU
*       es_huhdr   =                  " Internal Structure for Processing the HU Header
*       et_huhdr   =                  " Table Type for HU Headers in the Internal Structure
*       et_hutree  =                  " Table with HU Hierarchy Entries
*       et_huref   =                  " Table with HU References
      EXCEPTIONS
        not_found  = 1
        OTHERS     = 2.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*   WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4.
    ENDIF.

    READ TABLE gt_huitm INTO ls_huitm INDEX 1.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      IF lines( lt_serial_c ) <= ls_huitm-quan.
        ls_quantity-quan = lines( lt_serial_c ).
        ls_quantity-unit = ls_huitm-meins.
      ELSE.
        MESSAGE e540(zewm)."MESSAGE : 'ENTERD QTY IS EXCEEDING THE HU QTY' TYPE 'E'.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.

    SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO @LV_dguid_hu WHERE huident = @p2dest_h AND lgnum = @p_whnum.
    " Call repack_stock method
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->repack_stock
      EXPORTING
        iv_dest_hu    = lv_dguid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6F34FE6EA5D5C0B' "lv_dest_hu1" Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit
        iv_source_hu  = lv_guid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6F319AAFCF49C0B' "lv_source_hu" Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit"
        iv_stock_guid = ls_huitm-guid_stock "lv_stock_guid " GUID Stock Item
        is_quantity   = ls_quantity " Quantity Structure
*       is_valuation  =                  " Quantity Structure
*       iv_cwexact    =                  " Status of Valuation Quantity
*       it_serid      =                  " Serial Number
*       iv_no_event   = ' '              " Data Element for Domain BOOLE: TRUE (="X") and FALSE (=" ")
*       iv_addin      =                  " Data Type Dependent on Implementing Class
*  IMPORTING
*       es_quantity   =                  " Quantity Structure
      EXCEPTIONS
        error         = 1                " See Log
        OTHERS        = 2.


    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      CALL METHOD lo_packing->save
        EXPORTING
          iv_commit = 'X'
          iv_wait   = 'X'
        EXCEPTIONS
          error     = 1                " See Log
          OTHERS    = 2.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
    ENDIF.

****    HU TO BIN (UNPACK)
  ELSEIF p_hu IS NOT INITIAL AND p2_de_bi IS NOT INITIAL.
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->init
      EXPORTING
        iv_lgnum = p_whnum. "'XYZ'.          " Warehouse Number/Warehouse Complex
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      CALL METHOD /scwm/cl_wm_packing=>set_global_fields
        EXPORTING
          iv_lgnum = p_whnum "'XYZ'      " Warehouse Number/Warehouse Complex
        EXCEPTIONS
          error    = 1
          OTHERS   = 2.

      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
          EXPORTING
            iv_lgnum = p_whnum "'XYZ'
*           IO_PROT  =
          .
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.
    CLEAR : lv_guid_hu.
    SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO lv_guid_hu WHERE huident = p_hu AND lgnum = p_whnum.
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->get_hu
      EXPORTING
        iv_huident = p_hu "'300000037' " Handling Unit Identification
        iv_guid_hu = lv_guid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6DDB454F1CF5C0B' " Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit
*       iv_lock    =                  " Single-Character Indicator
*       iv_nlevel  =                  " Single-Character Flag
      IMPORTING
*       et_huident =
        et_huitm   = gt_huitm " Material Items in the HU
*       es_huhdr   =                  " Internal Structure for Processing the HU Header
*       et_huhdr   =                  " Table Type for HU Headers in the Internal Structure
*       et_hutree  =                  " Table with HU Hierarchy Entries
*       et_huref   =                  " Table with HU References
      EXCEPTIONS
        not_found  = 1
        OTHERS     = 2.
    READ TABLE gt_huitm INTO ls_huitm INDEX 1.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      IF lines( lt_serial_c ) <= ls_huitm-quan.
        ls_quantity-quan = lines( lt_serial_c ).
        ls_quantity-unit = ls_huitm-meins.
      ELSE.
        MESSAGE e540(zewm)."MESSAGE : 'ENTERD QTY IS EXCEEDING THE HU QTY' TYPE 'E'.
        CALL SCREEN 300.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->/scwm/if_pack_bas~unpack_stock
      EXPORTING
        iv_source_hu  = lv_guid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6DDB454F1CF5C0B' " Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit
        iv_stock_guid = ls_huitm-guid_stock " GUID Stock Item
        is_quantity   = ls_quantity " Quantity Structure
*       is_valuation  =                  " Quantity Structure
*       iv_cwexact    =                  " Status of Valuation Quantity
*       it_serid      =                  " Serial Number
        iv_dest_lgpla = p2_de_bi "'APGR-01' " Storage Bin
*       iv_addin      =                  " Data Type Dependent on Implementing Class
*       iv_altuom     =                  " new alt.UoM for HU item
*  IMPORTING
*       es_quantity   =                  " Quantity Structure
      EXCEPTIONS
        error         = 1                " See Log
        OTHERS        = 2.
    IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
      CALL METHOD lo_packing->save
        EXPORTING
          iv_commit = 'X'
          iv_wait   = 'X'
        EXCEPTIONS
          error     = 1                " See Log
          OTHERS    = 2.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
    ENDIF.

***    "hu to new hu
  ELSEIF p_hu IS NOT INITIAL AND p2_new_d IS NOT INITIAL.

    CREATE OBJECT g_create.

    CALL METHOD g_create->init
      EXPORTING
        iv_lgnum = p_whnum     " Warehouse Number/Warehouse Complex
*       is_pack_controle       =                  " Structure with Fields for Packing Control
*       iv_procty              =                  " Warehouse Process Type
*       iv_execute_whr_cleanup = 'X'              " Checkbox
      EXCEPTIONS
        error    = 1                " Error, see log
        OTHERS   = 2.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.

      CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
        EXPORTING
          iv_lgnum = p_whnum
*         IO_PROT  =
        .
    ENDIF.
    CLEAR : es_huhdr.

    CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERSION_EXIT_MDLPD_INPUT'
      EXPORTING
        input  = p2_new_d
      IMPORTING
        output = lv_pmat.

    "reading bin for sourse hu
    CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/HUHEADER_READ'
      EXPORTING
        iv_appl      = 'WME'
        iv_huident   = p_hu
        iv_db_select = 'X'
      IMPORTING
        et_huheader  = gt_huheader
*      EXCEPTIONS
*       NOT_FOUND    = 1
*       INPUT        = 2
*       ERROR        = 3
*       DELETED      = 4
*       OTHERS       = 5
      .
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    ENDIF.
    LOOP AT gt_huheader INTO DATA(ls_huheader) WHERE huident = p_hu AND lgnum = p_whnum.
      EXIT.
    ENDLOOP.

    "create new hu
    CALL METHOD g_create->/scwm/if_pack_bas~create_hu
      EXPORTING
        iv_pmat    = lv_pmat " Material GUID16 with Conversion Exit
*       iv_huident =                  " Handling Unit Identification
*       is_hu_create =
*       iv_nohuident =                  " Single-Character Indicator
        i_location = ls_huheader-lgpla "'
*       iv_loghu   =                  " Handling Unit Identification
      RECEIVING
        es_huhdr   = es_huhdr " Internal Structure for Processing the HU Header
      EXCEPTIONS
        error      = 1
        OTHERS     = 2.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      CALL METHOD g_create->save
        EXPORTING
          iv_commit = 'X'
          iv_wait   = 'X'
        EXCEPTIONS
          error     = 1                " See Log
          OTHERS    = 2.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
*   MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*     WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.
    "END OF NEW HU


    "MOVE HU TO NEW HU
    WAIT UP TO 5 SECONDS.
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->get_instance
      IMPORTING
*       es_hu_main  =                  " Structure with GLobal Fields and Indicators in Packing
        eo_instance = lo_packing. " Packing in WM with Immediately Confirmed Transfer Orders

    CALL METHOD lo_packing->init
      EXPORTING
        iv_lgnum = p_whnum "'XYZ'     " Warehouse Number/Warehouse Complex
*       is_pack_controle       =                  " Structure with Fields for Packing Control
*       iv_procty              =                  " Warehouse Process Type
*       iv_execute_whr_cleanup = 'X'              " Checkbox
      EXCEPTIONS
        error    = 1                " Error, see log
        OTHERS   = 2.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*   WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4.
    ENDIF.


    CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
      EXPORTING
        iv_lgnum = p_whnum "'XYZ'
*       IO_PROT  =
      .
    SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO lv_guid_hu WHERE huident = p_hu AND lgnum = p_whnum.

    CALL METHOD lo_packing->get_hu
      EXPORTING
        iv_huident = p_hu "'00000000000300000039' " Handling Unit Identification
        iv_guid_hu = lv_guid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6F319AAFCF49C0B' " Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit
*       iv_lock    =                  " Single-Character Indicator
*       iv_nlevel  =                  " Single-Character Flag
      IMPORTING
*       et_huident =
        et_huitm   = gt_huitm " Material Items in the HU
*       es_huhdr   =                  " Internal Structure for Processing the HU Header
*       et_huhdr   =                  " Table Type for HU Headers in the Internal Structure
*       et_hutree  =                  " Table with HU Hierarchy Entries
*       et_huref   =                  " Table with HU References
      EXCEPTIONS
        not_found  = 1
        OTHERS     = 2.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*   WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4.
    ENDIF.

    READ TABLE gt_huitm INTO ls_huitm INDEX 1.
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      IF lines( lt_serial_c ) <= ls_huitm-quan.
        ls_quantity-quan = lines( lt_serial_c ).
        ls_quantity-unit = ls_huitm-meins.
      ELSE.
        MESSAGE e540(zewm)."MESSAGE : 'ENTERD QTY IS EXCEEDING THE HU QTY' TYPE 'E'.
        CALL SCREEN 300.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.

    SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO @LV_dguid_hu WHERE huident = @ES_huhdr-huident AND lgnum = @p_whnum.
    " Call repack_stock method
    CALL METHOD lo_packing->repack_stock
      EXPORTING
        iv_dest_hu    = lv_dguid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6F34FE6EA5D5C0B' "lv_dest_hu1" Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit
        iv_source_hu  = lv_guid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A6F319AAFCF49C0B' "lv_source_hu" Unique Internal Identification of a Handling Unit"
        iv_stock_guid = ls_huitm-guid_stock "lv_stock_guid " GUID Stock Item
        is_quantity   = ls_quantity " Quantity Structure
*       is_valuation  =                  " Quantity Structure
*       iv_cwexact    =                  " Status of Valuation Quantity
*       it_serid      =                  " Serial Number
*       iv_no_event   = ' '              " Data Element for Domain BOOLE: TRUE (="X") and FALSE (=" ")
*       iv_addin      =                  " Data Type Dependent on Implementing Class
*  IMPORTING
*       es_quantity   =                  " Quantity Structure
      EXCEPTIONS
        error         = 1                " See Log
        OTHERS        = 2.


    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      CALL METHOD lo_packing->save
        EXPORTING
          iv_commit = 'X'
          iv_wait   = 'X'
        EXCEPTIONS
          error     = 1                " See Log
          OTHERS    = 2.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
    ENDIF.

***    "BIN TO HU (PACKING)

     APPEND VALUE #( sign = 'I'
                option = 'EQ'
                low = p2_src_b"'APGR-01'
                high = '' ) TO mt_lgplanw.
      CREATE OBJECT mo_ei_hu_obj.

      CALL METHOD mo_ei_hu_obj->/scwm/if_ex_hu_select~select
        EXPORTING
          iv_lgnum     = p_whnum "'' "mv_lgnum'
          iv_hierarchy = 'L' "lc_l
          ir_lgpla     = mt_lgplanw
        IMPORTING
          et_guid_hu   = mt_hu
        EXCEPTIONS
          wrong_input  = 1
          error        = 2
          OTHERS       = 3.
      IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
        ls_main_data-appl = 'WME'."lc_wme.
        ls_main_data-lgnum = p_whnum."'VCK1'."mv_lgnum.
        ls_main_data-details = abap_true.
        ls_main_data-lgpla = p2_src_b."''.
        CREATE OBJECT mo_packing_obj.

        CALL METHOD mo_packing_obj->/scwm/if_pack_bas~hu_gt_fill
          EXPORTING
            is_main_data = ls_main_data
            it_guid_hu   = mt_hu
          IMPORTING
            et_huhdr     = DATA(lt_huhdr) ##NEEDED
            et_ident     = DATA(lt_ident) ##NEEDED
            et_huitm     = DATA(lt_huitm) ##NEEDED
          EXCEPTIONS
            error        = 1
            OTHERS       = 2.
        IF sy-subrc = 0.
          /scwm/cl_log=>get_instance( IMPORTING eo_instance = mo_prot ).

          CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
            EXPORTING
              iv_lgnum = p_whnum
              io_prot  = mo_prot.


          CALL METHOD mo_packing_obj->init
            EXPORTING
              iv_lgnum = p_whnum "''
            EXCEPTIONS
              error    = 1
              OTHERS   = 2.
          IF lv_guid_stock IS INITIAL AND  lv_guid_parent IS INITIAL.
            lv_guid_parent = ls_faqua-guid_parent." '000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A4C631C0D4825C07' .
            lv_guid_stock  = ls_faqua-guid_stock." '000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A2B126227A25BC03' .
          ENDIF.
          ls_quantity-quan = lv_fqty."'2'.
          ls_quantity-unit = ls_faqua-unit. "'L'.

          SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO @LV_dguid_hu WHERE huident = @p2dest_h AND lgnum = @p_whnum.

          CALL METHOD mo_packing_obj->/scwm/if_pack_bas~repack_stock
            EXPORTING
              iv_dest_hu    = lv_dguid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FD0AEE6AB7139E5A000' "ms_hundlernw-guid_hu
              iv_source_hu  = lv_guid_parent
              iv_stock_guid = lv_guid_stock
              is_quantity   = ls_quantity
*             it_serid      = lt_serid
            EXCEPTIONS
              error         = 1
              OTHERS        = 2.
          IF sy-subrc = 0.
            mo_packing_obj->/scwm/if_pack_bas~save(
                        EXPORTING
                          iv_commit = abap_true
                          iv_wait   = abap_true
                        EXCEPTIONS
                          error     = 1                " See Log
                          OTHERS    = 2
                      ).

            IF sy-subrc = 0.
            
    ENDIF.

***     "SOURCE BIN TO NEW HU

    CALL FUNCTION '/SCMB/MDL_KEYC_BY_MATNR_SNL' ##FM_SUBRC_OK
      EXPORTING
        iv_matnr = p_matnr
      IMPORTING

*         is_pack_controle       =                  " Structure with Fields for Packing Control

      IF sy-subrc = 0.

        CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
          EXPORTING
            iv_lgnum = p_whnum
*           IO_PROT  =
          .
      ENDIF.
      CLEAR : es_huhdr.

      CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERSION_EXIT_MDLPD_INPUT'
        EXPORTING
          input  = p2_new_d
        IMPORTING

      "create new hu

        EXPORTING
          iv_pmat    = lv_pmat " Material GUID16 with Conversion Exit
*         iv_huident =                  " Handling Unit Identification
*         is_hu_create =
*         iv_nohuident =                  " Single-Character Indicator
          i_location = ls_faqua1-lgpla "'
*         iv_loghu   =                  " Handling Unit Identification
        RECEIVING
          es_huhdr   = es_huhdr " Internal Structure for Processing the HU Header
        EXCEPTIONS
          error      = 1
          OTHERS     = 2.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.

          EXPORTING

            iv_wait   = 'X'

            OTHERS    = 2.
        IF sy-subrc <> 0.
*   MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
*     WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4.
        ENDIF.
      ENDIF.
      "END OF NEW HU

      APPEND VALUE #( sign = 'I'
          option = 'EQ'
          low = p2_src_b"''
          high = '' ) TO mt_lgplanw.
      CREATE OBJECT mo_ei_hu_obj.

      CALL METHOD mo_ei_hu_obj->/scwm/if_ex_hu_select~select
        EXPORTING
          iv_lgnum     = p_whnum "' "mv_lgnum'
          iv_hierarchy = 'L' "lc_l
          ir_lgpla     = mt_lgplanw
        IMPORTING
          et_guid_hu   = mt_hu
        EXCEPTIONS
          wrong_input  = 1
          error        = 2
          OTHERS       = 3.
      IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
        ls_main_data-appl = 'WME'."lc_wme.
        ls_main_data-lgnum = p_whnum."''."mv_lgnum.
        ls_main_data-details = abap_true.

        CREATE OBJECT mo_packing_obj.

            it_guid_hu   = mt_hu
          IMPORTING

            et_ident     = DATA(lt_ident1) ##NEEDED

        IF sy-subrc = 0.

          CALL FUNCTION '/SCWM/TO_INIT_NEW'
            EXPORTING
              iv_lgnum = p_whnum
              io_prot  = mo_prot.


          CALL METHOD mo_packing_obj->init
            EXPORTING
              iv_lgnum = p_whnum "''
            EXCEPTIONS
              error    = 1
              OTHERS   = 2.
          IF lv_guid_stock IS INITIAL AND  lv_guid_parent IS INITIAL.
            lv_guid_parent = ls_faqua1-guid_parent." '000D3A2BB8FF1FE0A4C631C0D4825C07' .

          ENDIF.
          ls_quantity-quan = lv_fqty."'2'.
          ls_quantity-unit = ls_faqua1-unit. "'L'.

          SELECT SINGLE guid_hu FROM /scwm/huhdr INTO @LV_dguid_hu WHERE huident = @ES_huhdr-huident AND lgnum = @p_whnum.

          CALL METHOD mo_packing_obj->/scwm/if_pack_bas~repack_stock
            EXPORTING
              iv_dest_hu    = lv_dguid_hu "'000D3A2BB8FF1FD0AEE6AB7139E5A000' "ms_hundlernw-guid_hu
              iv_source_hu  = lv_guid_parent
              iv_stock_guid = lv_guid_stock
              is_quantity   = ls_quantity
*             it_serid      = lt_serid

                          error     = 1                " See Log
                          OTHERS    = 2
                      ).

            IF sy-subrc = 0.

           ENDIF.

entry.title: ABAP CDS View how to display fields as properties for a Dimension in Live model SAC
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I have an ABAP CDS View on an ADSO, for one of the ADSO fields "/bic/z_attivit" I'm trying to display some attributes as properties of the dimension "Attivita" in SAC in a Live Data model based on the CDS View.  I cannot understand what is missing in the code, however I'm not able to see the fields as properties...

Can you please help me and provide any suggestion? this is the CDS View on the Attributes I'm trying to expose: 

 

@AbapCatalog.sqlViewName: 'ZI_ATTVT_ATTR'

@AbapCatalog.compiler.compareFilter: true

@AbapCatalog.preserveKey: true

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED

@EndUserText.label: 'Attività - Attributi (Tabella P, non time-dependent)'

@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true

@ObjectModel.representativeKey: '/bic/zAttivit'

@vdm.viewType: #BASIC

@analytics:{

dataCategory: #DIMENSION,

dataExtraction: {

enabled: true,

delta.changeDataCapture: {

automatic: true

}

}

}

 

@ObjectModel.supportedCapabilities: [ #ANALYTICAL_DIMENSION, #CDS_MODELING_ASSOCIATION_TARGET, #SQL_DATA_SOURCE, #CDS_MODELING_DATA_SOURCE, #EXTRACTION_DATA_SOURCE ]

@ObjectModel.modelingPattern: #ANALYTICAL_DIMENSION

 

 

define view ZI_ATTIVITA_ATTR as select from /bic/pz_attivit as p

 

association [0..1] to /bic/tz_attivit as t

on t./bic/z_attivit =p./bic/z_attivit

 

association [0..1] to /bic/tz_mattiv as tm

on tm./bic/z_mattiv=p./bic/z_mattiv

 

{

key /bic/z_attivit as /bic/zAttivit,

key objvers as Objvers,

changed as Changed,

/bic/z_mambito as /bic/zMambito,

/bic/z_ambito as /bic/zAmbito,

/bic/z_mattiv as /bic/zMattiv,

/bic/z_contab as AttivitaFlatSINO,

@Semantics.text: true

t.txtlg as AttivitaDescrizione,

tm.txtlg as MacroAttivitaDescrizione

 

}

 

in the top CDS CUBE i have these reference to the underlying CDS View:

 

@AbapCatalog.sqlViewName: 'ZI_COMMR011_CUBE'

@EndUserText.label: 'COMM R011 – CUBE (base + SERWDET)'

@ClientHandling.algorithm: #SESSION_VARIABLE

@vdm.viewType: #COMPOSITE

@analytics.dataExtraction.enabled: true

@vdm.lifecycle.contract.type: #PUBLIC_LOCAL_API

@AbapCatalog.preserveKey: true

@AbapCatalog.compiler.compareFilter: true

@analytics: { dataCategory: #CUBE } //, dataExtraction.enabled: true }

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #CHECK

@AbapCatalog.buffering.status: #NOT_ALLOWED

@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true

@Metadata.allowExtensions: true

@ObjectModel.usageType.sizeCategory: #XXL

@ObjectModel.usageType.serviceQuality: #D

@ObjectModel.usageType.dataClass: #MIXED

@AccessControl.personalData.blocking:#REQUIRED

@ObjectModel.supportedCapabilities: [ #ANALYTICAL_PROVIDER ]

@ObjectModel.modelingPattern: #ANALYTICAL_CUBE

 

define view ZC_COMMR011_CUBE as select from /bic/ad_commr011 as base

 

 

// Attributi per Attivita' (Campo base: /bic/z_attivit)

association [0..1] to ZI_ATTIVITA_ATTR as _ZAttivitaAttr on _ZAttivitaAttr./bic/zAttivit = base./bic/z_attivit and _ZAttivitaAttr.Objvers = 'A'

{

 

//...fields selection

 

@ObjectModel.foreignKey.association: '_ZAttivitaAttr'

base./bic/z_attivit as /bic/zAttivit,

 

//...more fields

 

_ZAttivitaAttr

}

 

Many thanks for any help.

Filomena

entry.title: IF_WEB_HTTP_CLIENT suppress sap_passport header
entry.content:
I am on SAP BTP ABAP Environment.

I want to make a call to a rest-api using if_web_http_client in combination with cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_comm_arrangement and cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination

The API gives me an http code 400 with message that request has syntax errors. The call when using create_by_url is working just fine. 
I traced it back that in the call the header sap_passport gets set. The API cant handle that. There seems to be a similar problem in CPI: Solved: Suppress HTTP headers on SAP CPI HTTP adapter - SAP Community

I tried to deactive propertytype_send_sap_passport with

set_distributed_tracing_status( i_epp_status = abap_false ).

At the first two levels the attribute is set correctly, but on the third level it is set wrong as shown here in the screenshot:

So MO_HTTP_CLIENT->propertytype_send_sap_passport = 0.

MO_HTTP_CLIENT->MO_HTTP_CLIENT->propertytype_send_sap_passport = 0.

Buth then:
MO_HTTP_CLIENT->MO_HTTP_CLIENT->MO_CLIENT->propertytype_send_sap_passport = 1.

This is because when calling mo_http_client = cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination with cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_comm_arrangement in class cl_http_client in method create_by_destination the function RFC_READ_HTTP_DESTINATION is called which returns epp_enabled = abap_true and the method set_distributed_tracing_status does not override it correctly. 

Seems to me like a bug in the code?
Is there any way to customize the field epp_enabled in Communication Systems or to set the value of the property to 0?

Thanks in advande!

Here is my template code:

DATA(lt_outbound_services) = lo_ca->get_outbound_services( ).

DATA(lv_outb_serv_id) = VALUE #( lt_outbound_services[ 1 ]-id OPTIONAL ).

 

DATA(lo_dbug_desto) = cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_url( 'https://api.evatr.vies.bzst.de/app/v1/abfrage' ).

DATA(lo_destination) = cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_comm_arrangement(

comm_scenario = ms_service_customizing-CommunicationScenario

comm_system_id = lo_ca->get_comm_system_id( )

service_id = lv_outb_serv_id ).

 

IF debug = abap_false.

mo_http_client = cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination( lo_destination ).

ELSE.

mo_http_client = cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination( lo_dbug_desto ).

ENDIF.

 

mo_http_client->get_http_request( )->set_text( i_text = mv_json_http_body ).

mo_http_client->get_http_request( )->set_content_type( 'application/json' ).

mo_http_client->set_distributed_tracing_status( i_epp_status = abap_false ).

entry.title: My Experiments with ABAP
entry.content:
Caution: These programs can harm your system.

Note: Though these programs were built with wrong intentions, they are not used till date for the purpose they were built for. Not that I want it to be used but I have been thinking to share it with everyone. I too have no intentions to use them either now.

There are 3 programs which trigger sequentially, and I will explain the purposes of each one of them in detail:

1. Program 1 – You need to input a specific date and time in future and a valid SAP User ID in the system. This program will schedule a background job for the User ID on the given date and time provided in the selection screen. The calling program of the job will be Program 2. So basically, you will schedule a job for someone else to be triggered on a specific date and time in future. Here you may require bypassing some authorizations if your ID does not have them while scheduling the job for someone else.

 

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Report ZTEST101
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ztest101.

SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK b1 WITH FRAME TITLE TEXT-001.
  PARAMETERS: p_user  TYPE xubname MATCHCODE OBJECT user_addr,
              p_tdate TYPE datum DEFAULT sy-datum,
              p_ttime TYPE uzeit,
              p_commen TYPE dtinf_char255_case MODIF ID ad1 DEFAULT '** Changes by <USERID> on <DATE>'.
SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK b1.

INITIALIZATION.
p_ttime = sy-uzeit + 120.

START-OF-SELECTION.

  PERFORM validate_mandatory.

  PERFORM process_data.

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form validate_mandatory
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM validate_mandatory .

  IF p_user  IS INITIAL.
    MESSAGE TEXT-e01 TYPE 'S' DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
    LEAVE LIST-PROCESSING.
  ELSE.
    SELECT SINGLE bname FROM usr01 INTO @DATA(ls_usr01) WHERE bname EQ @p_user.
    IF sy-subrc NE 0.
      MESSAGE TEXT-e06 TYPE 'S' DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
      LEAVE LIST-PROCESSING.
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.

  IF p_tdate  IS INITIAL.
    MESSAGE TEXT-e02 TYPE 'S' DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
    LEAVE LIST-PROCESSING.
  ENDIF.

  IF p_tdate LT sy-datum.
    MESSAGE TEXT-e04 TYPE 'S' DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
    LEAVE LIST-PROCESSING.
  ELSEIF p_tdate  EQ sy-datum.
    IF p_ttime LE sy-uzeit.
      MESSAGE TEXT-e05 TYPE 'S' DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
      LEAVE LIST-PROCESSING.
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.

ENDFORM.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form process_data
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM process_data .

  DATA: lv_jobcount      TYPE btcjobcnt,
        lv_opcode        TYPE btcint4 VALUE 20,
        lv_jobhead       TYPE tbtcjob,
        lv_authcknam     TYPE btcauthnam,
        lt_steplist      TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF tbtcstep,
        ls_vari_desc     TYPE varid,
        lt_vari_contents TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF rsparams,
        lv_date          TYPE btcsdate,
        lv_time          TYPE btcstime,
        lt_vari_text     TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF varit.

  CONSTANTS: lc_jobname TYPE btcjob VALUE '/AIF/SAP_AIF_AUTO_REPROCSING'.

  CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_OPEN'
    EXPORTING
      jobname          = lc_jobname
    IMPORTING
      jobcount         = lv_jobcount
    EXCEPTIONS
      cant_create_job  = 1
      invalid_job_data = 2
      jobname_missing  = 3
      OTHERS           = 4.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
  ELSE.
    CALL FUNCTION 'BP_JOB_READ'
      EXPORTING
        job_read_jobcount     = lv_jobcount
        job_read_jobname      = lc_jobname
        job_read_opcode       = lv_opcode
      IMPORTING
        job_read_jobhead      = lv_jobhead
      TABLES
        job_read_steplist     = lt_steplist
      EXCEPTIONS
        invalid_opcode        = 1
        job_doesnt_exist      = 2
        job_doesnt_have_steps = 3
        OTHERS                = 4.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
    ELSE.
      lv_opcode = 16.

      lv_jobhead-sdluname = p_user.
      lv_jobhead-reluname = p_user.
      lv_jobhead-authcknam = p_user.
      lv_jobhead-lastchname = p_user.
      lv_jobhead-sdlstrtdt = p_tdate.
      lv_jobhead-sdlstrttm = p_ttime + 60.

      READ TABLE lt_steplist ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_step>) INDEX 1.
      IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
        <lfs_step>-authcknam = p_user.
        <lfs_step>-prrec = p_user.
      ENDIF.

      CALL FUNCTION 'BP_JOB_MODIFY'
        EXPORTING
          dialog                     = 'N'
          jobcount                   = lv_jobcount
          opcode                     = lv_opcode
          jobname                    = lc_jobname
          new_jobhead                = lv_jobhead
        IMPORTING
          modified_jobhead           = lv_jobhead
        TABLES
          new_steplist               = lt_steplist
        EXCEPTIONS
          cant_derelease_job         = 1
          cant_enq_job               = 2
          cant_read_jobdata          = 3
          cant_release_job           = 4
          cant_set_jobstatus_in_db   = 5
          cant_start_job_immediately = 6
          cant_update_jobdata        = 7
          eventcnt_generation_error  = 8
          invalid_dialog_type        = 9
          invalid_new_jobdata        = 10
          invalid_new_jobstatus      = 11
          invalid_opcode             = 12
          invalid_startdate          = 13
          job_edit_failed            = 14
          job_modify_canceled        = 15
          job_not_modifiable_anymore = 16
          nothing_to_do              = 17
          no_batch_on_target_host    = 18
          no_batch_server_found      = 19
          no_batch_wp_for_jobclass   = 20
          no_modify_privilege_given  = 21
          no_release_privilege_given = 22
          no_startdate_no_release    = 23
          target_host_not_defined    = 24
          tgt_host_chk_has_failed    = 25
          invalid_targetgroup        = 26
          conflicting_targets        = 27
          OTHERS                     = 28.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
      ELSE.

        ls_vari_desc-report = |ZTEST102|.
        ls_vari_desc-variant = |ZVAR102|.
        ls_vari_desc-environmnt = |A|.

        REPLACE ALL OCCURRENCES OF |<USERID>| IN p_commen WITH p_user.
        REPLACE ALL OCCURRENCES OF |<DATE>| IN p_commen WITH |{ p_tdate+6(2) }| && |.| && |{ p_tdate+4(2) }| && |.|
                                                          && |{ p_tdate+0(4) }|.

        APPEND INITIAL LINE TO lt_vari_contents ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_vari_contents>).
        <lfs_vari_contents>-selname = |P_COMMEN|.
        <lfs_vari_contents>-kind = |P|.
        <lfs_vari_contents>-low = p_commen.

        CALL FUNCTION 'RS_CREATE_VARIANT'
          EXPORTING
            curr_report               = 'ZTEST102'
            curr_variant              = 'ZVAR102'
            vari_desc                 = ls_vari_desc
          TABLES
            vari_contents             = lt_vari_contents
            vari_text                 = lt_vari_text
          EXCEPTIONS
            illegal_report_or_variant = 1
            illegal_variantname       = 2
            not_authorized            = 3
            not_executed              = 4
            report_not_existent       = 5
            report_not_supplied       = 6
            variant_exists            = 7
            variant_locked            = 8
            OTHERS                    = 9.
        IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
        ENDIF.

        lv_authcknam = p_user.

        CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_SUBMIT'
          EXPORTING
            authcknam               = lv_authcknam
            jobcount                = lv_jobcount
            jobname                 = lc_jobname
            report                  = 'ZTEST102'
            variant                 = 'ZVAR102'
          EXCEPTIONS
            bad_priparams           = 1
            bad_xpgflags            = 2
            invalid_jobdata         = 3
            jobname_missing         = 4
            job_notex               = 5
            job_submit_failed       = 6
            lock_failed             = 7
            program_missing         = 8
            prog_abap_and_extpg_set = 9
            OTHERS                  = 10.
        IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
        ELSE.

          lv_date = p_tdate.
          lv_time = p_ttime + 60.

          CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_CLOSE'
            EXPORTING
              jobcount             = lv_jobcount
              jobname              = lc_jobname
              sdlstrtdt            = lv_date
              sdlstrttm            = lv_time
            EXCEPTIONS
              cant_start_immediate = 1
              invalid_startdate    = 2
              jobname_missing      = 3
              job_close_failed     = 4
              job_nosteps          = 5
              job_notex            = 6
              lock_failed          = 7
              invalid_target       = 8
              invalid_time_zone    = 9
              OTHERS               = 10.
          IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
          ENDIF.
        ENDIF.

      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

2. Program 2 – Here you will require to do some basic ABAP coding or require help from an ABAPer. Templates on how to use are already provided. You need to provide specific programs and/or function modules and/or classes along with a specific line number and a line of code. Basically, this program will go and alter the programs and/or function modules and/or classes on that specific line numbers you gave with the new line of code you gave. Additionally, you can also provide specific objects along with a Transport request and this program will remove those objects from the Transport. Also, you can provide info to alter TVARVC entries in the system. Remember: This program will trigger as a background job on the user provided by you in Program 1. After everything is done, at the end this program will trigger Program 3 as another background job.

 

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Report ZTEST102
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ztest102.


TYPES: BEGIN OF ty_program,
         prg_name TYPE programm,
         line_no  TYPE sytabix,
         new_code TYPE char255,
       END OF ty_program,

       tt_program TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_program WITH DEFAULT KEY,

       BEGIN OF ty_tvarvc,
         name TYPE rvari_vnam,
         type TYPE rsscr_kind,
         numb TYPE tvarv_numb,
         low  TYPE rvari_val_255,
         high TYPE rvari_val_255,
       END OF ty_tvarvc,

       tt_tvarvc TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_tvarvc WITH DEFAULT KEY,

       BEGIN OF ty_transport,
         transport_no TYPE trkorr,
         all_data     TYPE flag,
         e071_entry   TYPE e071_t,
       END OF ty_transport,

       tt_transport TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_transport WITH DEFAULT KEY,

       BEGIN OF ty_change_data,
         change_type       TYPE char2,
         program_changes   TYPE tt_program,
         tvarvc_changes    TYPE tt_tvarvc,
         transport_changes TYPE tt_transport,
       END OF ty_change_data.

DATA: gt_complete_changes TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_change_data.

SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK b1.
  PARAMETERS: p_commen TYPE dtinf_char255_case,
              p_notif  AS CHECKBOX,
              p_intvl  TYPE char3.
SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK b1.

CLEAR: gt_complete_changes.

PERFORM populate_changes.

PERFORM trigger_changes.

PERFORM remove_all.

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form populate_changes
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM populate_changes .

**** Examples to populate data
*************************************** For SE38 Program ***************************************
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO gt_complete_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_complete_changes>).
*  <lfs_complete_changes>-change_type = |PR|.
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_complete_changes>-program_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_program_changes>).
*
*  <lfs_program_changes>-prg_name = |ZXXXX_XXXX|.
*  <lfs_program_changes>-line_no = 15.
*  <lfs_program_changes>-new_code = 'WRITE : / |1234|'.

*************************************** For SE24 Class ***************************************
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO gt_complete_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_complete_changes>).
*  <lfs_complete_changes>-change_type = |PR|.
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_complete_changes>-program_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_program_changes>).
*
*  <lfs_program_changes>-prg_name = |ZXXX_TEST=====================CM001|.
*  <lfs_program_changes>-line_no = 5.
*  <lfs_program_changes>-new_code = 'WRITE : / |1234|'.

*************************************** For SE37 Function Module ***************************************
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO gt_complete_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_complete_changes>).
*  <lfs_complete_changes>-change_type = |PR|.
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_complete_changes>-program_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_program_changes>).
*
*  <lfs_program_changes>-prg_name = |LZXXXX_XXXXXU02|.
*  <lfs_program_changes>-line_no = 45.
*  <lfs_program_changes>-new_code = 'WRITE : / |1234|'.

*************************************** For TVARVC ***************************************
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO gt_complete_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_complete_changes>).
*  <lfs_complete_changes>-change_type = |TV|.
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_complete_changes>-tvarvc_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_tvarvc_changes>).
*
*  <lfs_tvarvc_changes>-name = |ZXXXX_XXXXXXX|.
*  <lfs_tvarvc_changes>-type = |S|.
*  <lfs_tvarvc_changes>-numb = 0001.
*  <lfs_tvarvc_changes>-low = |ABCD|.

*************************************** For Transport - All Objects ***************************************
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO gt_complete_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_complete_changes>).
*  <lfs_complete_changes>-change_type = |TR|.
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_complete_changes>-transport_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_transport_changes>).
*
*  <lfs_transport_changes>-transport_no = |XXXK906454|.       "This would be task, not Transport
*  <lfs_transport_changes>-all_data = |X|.

*************************************** For Transport - Specific Objects ***************************************
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO gt_complete_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_complete_changes>).
*  <lfs_complete_changes>-change_type = |TR|.
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_complete_changes>-transport_changes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_transport_changes>).
*
*  APPEND INITIAL LINE TO <lfs_transport_changes>-e071_entry ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_e071_entry>).
*  <lfs_e071_entry>-trkorr = |XXXK906454|.       "This would be task, not Transport
*  <lfs_e071_entry>-as4pos = |000004|.
*  <lfs_e071_entry>-pgmid = |R3TR|.
*  <lfs_e071_entry>-object = |PROG|.
*  <lfs_e071_entry>-obj_name = |ZXXXX_XXXX|.

ENDFORM.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form trigger_changes
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM trigger_changes .

  DATA: lt_source_ext TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF abaptxt255,
        ls_source_ext TYPE abaptxt255,
        ls_request    TYPE trwbo_request.

  DATA: lt_source_empty TYPE rswsourcet,
        ls_trdir        TYPE trdir,
        ls_progdir      TYPE progdir,
        lv_program      TYPE seu_name.

  DATA: lv_min TYPE i VALUE 20, " min value of the range of numbers
        lv_max TYPE i VALUE 120. " max value of the range of numbers

  DATA: lo_rand TYPE REF TO cl_abap_random_int,
        lv_next TYPE i,
        lv_seed TYPE i.

  CONSTANTS:
    srext_active  TYPE c VALUE 'A',
    srext_include TYPE c VALUE 'I'.

  " random number sequence.
  lv_seed = cl_abap_random=>seed( ).
  cl_abap_random_int=>create(
             EXPORTING
             seed = lv_seed
             min = lv_min
             max = lv_max
             RECEIVING
             prng = lo_rand
  ).

  LOOP AT gt_complete_changes INTO DATA(ls_changes).
    IF p_intvl IS NOT INITIAL.
      lv_next = p_intvl.
    ELSE.
      lv_next = lo_rand->get_next( ) . "it will return the next random number
    ENDIF.
    WAIT UP TO lv_next SECONDS.

    CASE ls_changes-change_type.
      WHEN 'PR'.
        LOOP AT ls_changes-program_changes INTO DATA(ls_program_changes).
          CLEAR lt_source_ext.

          CALL FUNCTION 'RPY_PROGRAM_READ'
            EXPORTING
              program_name     = ls_program_changes-prg_name
            TABLES
              source_extended  = lt_source_ext
            EXCEPTIONS
              cancelled        = 1
              not_found        = 2
              permission_error = 3
              OTHERS           = 4.
          IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
          ELSE.
            READ TABLE lt_source_ext ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_source_ext>) INDEX ls_program_changes-line_no.
            IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
              <lfs_source_ext>-line = ls_program_changes-new_code.
            ENDIF.

            ls_source_ext-line = p_commen.

            INSERT ls_source_ext INTO lt_source_ext INDEX ls_program_changes-line_no.

            CALL FUNCTION 'PRETTY_PRINTER'
              EXPORTING
                inctoo             = ls_program_changes-prg_name
              TABLES
                ntext              = lt_source_ext
                otext              = lt_source_ext
              EXCEPTIONS
                enqueue_table_full = 1
                include_enqueued   = 2
                include_readerror  = 3
                include_writeerror = 4
                OTHERS             = 5.
            IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
            ENDIF.

            IF lt_source_ext IS NOT INITIAL.

              CLEAR: ls_trdir.

              SELECT SINGLE * FROM trdir INTO ls_trdir WHERE name = ls_program_changes-prg_name.
              IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
                INSERT REPORT ls_program_changes-prg_name FROM lt_source_ext STATE srext_active.

                MOVE-CORRESPONDING ls_trdir TO ls_progdir.
                ls_progdir-state = srext_active.
                CALL FUNCTION 'UPDATE_PROGDIR'
                  EXPORTING
                    i_progdir    = ls_progdir
                    i_progname   = ls_progdir-name
                    i_state      = ls_progdir-state
                  EXCEPTIONS
                    not_executed = 1
                    OTHERS       = 2.
                IF sy-subrc NE 0.
                ENDIF.
                IF ls_trdir-subc <> srext_include.

                  "complete program
                  lv_program = ls_program_changes-prg_name.
                  CALL FUNCTION 'WB_TREE_ACTUALIZE'
                    EXPORTING
                      tree_name              = CONV eu_t_name( 'PG_' && lv_program )
                      without_crossreference = abap_true. "move to background

                  cl_where_used_list_utilities=>update_index_in_background( p_name = CONV #( lv_program ) ).
                ELSE.

                  CLEAR lt_source_empty.

                  "should be the delta but the SOURCE_OLD is empty :-(
                  "don't update cross reference for single includes. This should be done with the main program
                  CALL FUNCTION 'RS_PROGRAM_INDEX_DELTA'
                    EXPORTING
                      include_name    = ls_trdir-name
                      include_type    = ls_trdir-subc
                      suppress_xcross = abap_true
                    TABLES
                      source_new      = lt_source_ext
                      source_old      = lt_source_empty.
                ENDIF.
              ENDIF.
            ENDIF.
          ENDIF.
        ENDLOOP.
      WHEN 'TV'.
        LOOP AT ls_changes-tvarvc_changes INTO DATA(ls_tvarvc_changes).

          UPDATE tvarvc  SET low =  ls_tvarvc_changes-low
                             high = ls_tvarvc_changes-high
                   WHERE name = ls_tvarvc_changes-name
                   AND type = ls_tvarvc_changes-type
                   AND numb = ls_tvarvc_changes-numb.

        ENDLOOP.
      WHEN 'TR'.
        LOOP AT ls_changes-transport_changes INTO DATA(ls_transport_changes).
          IF ls_transport_changes-all_data IS NOT INITIAL.

            SELECT trkorr, as4pos, pgmid, object, obj_name, objfunc,
                   lockflag, gennum, lang, activity FROM e071 INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_e071)
              WHERE trkorr = @LS_transport_changes-transport_no.
            IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
              SORT lt_e071 BY trkorr as4pos.
            ENDIF.
          ELSE.
            lt_e071 = ls_transport_changes-e071_entry.
          ENDIF.
          LOOP AT lt_e071 INTO DATA(ls_e071).
            ls_request-h-trkorr = ls_e071-trkorr.

            CALL FUNCTION 'TR_DELETE_COMM_OBJECT_KEYS'
              EXPORTING
                is_e071_delete              = ls_e071
                iv_dialog_flag              = ' '
              CHANGING
                cs_request                  = ls_request
              EXCEPTIONS
                e_database_access_error     = 1
                e_empty_lockkey             = 2
                e_bad_target_request        = 3
                e_wrong_source_client       = 4
                n_no_deletion_of_c_objects  = 5
                n_no_deletion_of_corr_entry = 6
                n_object_entry_doesnt_exist = 7
                n_request_already_released  = 8
                n_request_from_other_system = 9
                r_action_aborted_by_user    = 10
                r_foreign_lock              = 11
                w_bigger_lock_in_same_order = 12
                w_duplicate_entry           = 13
                w_no_authorization          = 14
                w_user_not_owner            = 15
                OTHERS                      = 16.
            IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
            ENDIF.
          ENDLOOP.
          CLEAR: lt_e071.
        ENDLOOP.
      WHEN OTHERS.

    ENDCASE.
  ENDLOOP.

  COMMIT WORK.

ENDFORM.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form remove_all
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM remove_all .

  DATA: lv_jobcount TYPE btcjobcnt,
        lv_date     TYPE btcsdate,
        lv_time     TYPE btcstime.

  CONSTANTS: lc_jobname TYPE btcjob VALUE 'ZTEST123'.

  CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_OPEN'
    EXPORTING
      jobname          = lc_jobname
    IMPORTING
      jobcount         = lv_jobcount
    EXCEPTIONS
      cant_create_job  = 1
      invalid_job_data = 2
      jobname_missing  = 3
      OTHERS           = 4.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
  ELSE.

    SUBMIT ztest103 VIA JOB lc_jobname NUMBER lv_jobcount AND RETURN.

    lv_date = sy-datum.
    lv_time = sy-uzeit + 60.

    CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_CLOSE'
      EXPORTING
        jobcount             = lv_jobcount
        jobname              = lc_jobname
        sdlstrtdt            = lv_date
        sdlstrttm            = lv_time
      EXCEPTIONS
        cant_start_immediate = 1
        invalid_startdate    = 2
        jobname_missing      = 3
        job_close_failed     = 4
        job_nosteps          = 5
        job_notex            = 6
        lock_failed          = 7
        invalid_target       = 8
        invalid_time_zone    = 9
        OTHERS               = 10.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

3. Program 3 – The purpose of this program is to delete everything as much as it can. It will delete Program 1 and Program 2. It will delete the Job that was running for Program 2. Since it cannot delete itself i.e. Program 3, but it can still alter its own code at the end. So, anyone tries to check Program 3, they will only see a mere Select statement on MARA.

 

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Report ZTEST103
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ztest103.

DATA: lt_source_ext      TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF abaptxt255,
      lv_current_program TYPE programm.

CONSTANTS: lc_jobname TYPE btcjob VALUE '/AIF/SAP_AIF_AUTO_REPROCSING'.
CONSTANTS: lc_jobname1 TYPE btcjob VALUE 'ZTEST123'.

SELECT jobname,
       jobcount
  FROM tbtco
  INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_tbtco)
  WHERE jobname = @LC_jobname.

LOOP AT lt_tbtco INTO DATA(ls_tbtco).

  CALL FUNCTION 'BP_JOB_DELETE'
    EXPORTING
      jobcount                 = ls_tbtco-jobcount
      jobname                  = ls_tbtco-jobname
    EXCEPTIONS
      cant_delete_event_entry  = 1
      cant_delete_job          = 2
      cant_delete_joblog       = 3
      cant_delete_steps        = 4
      cant_delete_time_entry   = 5
      cant_derelease_successor = 6
      cant_enq_predecessor     = 7
      cant_enq_successor       = 8
      cant_enq_tbtco_entry     = 9
      cant_update_predecessor  = 10
      cant_update_successor    = 11
      commit_failed            = 12
      jobcount_missing         = 13
      jobname_missing          = 14
      job_does_not_exist       = 15
      job_is_already_running   = 16
      no_delete_authority      = 17
      OTHERS                   = 18.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
  ENDIF.
ENDLOOP.

CALL FUNCTION 'RS_DELETE_PROGRAM'
  EXPORTING
    program            = 'ZTEST101'
    suppress_checks    = 'X'
    suppress_popup     = 'X'
  EXCEPTIONS
    enqueue_lock       = 1
    object_not_found   = 2
    permission_failure = 3
    reject_deletion    = 4
    OTHERS             = 5.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
ENDIF.

CALL FUNCTION 'RS_DELETE_PROGRAM'
  EXPORTING
    program            = 'ZTEST102'
    suppress_checks    = 'X'
    suppress_popup     = 'X'
  EXCEPTIONS
    enqueue_lock       = 1
    object_not_found   = 2
    permission_failure = 3
    reject_deletion    = 4
    OTHERS             = 5.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
ENDIF.

lv_current_program = sy-cprog.

CALL FUNCTION 'RPY_PROGRAM_READ'
  EXPORTING
    program_name     = lv_current_program
  TABLES
    source_extended  = lt_source_ext
  EXCEPTIONS
    cancelled        = 1
    not_found        = 2
    permission_error = 3
    OTHERS           = 4.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
ELSE.

  DELETE lt_source_ext FROM 9.

  READ TABLE lt_source_ext ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_source_ext>) INDEX 8.
  IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
    <lfs_source_ext>-line = |SELECT matnr FROM mara INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_matnr) UP TO 10 ROWS.|.
  ENDIF.

  CALL FUNCTION 'RPY_PROGRAM_UPDATE'
    EXPORTING
      program_name     = lv_current_program
    TABLES
      source_extended  = lt_source_ext
    EXCEPTIONS
      cancelled        = 1
      permission_error = 2
      not_found        = 3
      OTHERS           = 4.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
  ENDIF.

ENDIF.

SELECT jobname,
       jobcount
  FROM tbtco
  INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_tbtco1)
  WHERE jobname = @LC_jobname1.

LOOP AT lt_tbtco1 INTO DATA(ls_tbtco1).

  CALL FUNCTION 'BP_JOB_DELETE'
    EXPORTING
      jobcount                 = ls_tbtco1-jobcount
      jobname                  = ls_tbtco1-jobname
    EXCEPTIONS
      cant_delete_event_entry  = 1
      cant_delete_job          = 2
      cant_delete_joblog       = 3
      cant_delete_steps        = 4
      cant_delete_time_entry   = 5
      cant_derelease_successor = 6
      cant_enq_predecessor     = 7
      cant_enq_successor       = 8
      cant_enq_tbtco_entry     = 9
      cant_update_predecessor  = 10
      cant_update_successor    = 11
      commit_failed            = 12
      jobcount_missing         = 13
      jobname_missing          = 14
      job_does_not_exist       = 15
      job_is_already_running   = 16
      no_delete_authority      = 17
      OTHERS                   = 18.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
  ENDIF.
ENDLOOP.

entry.title: Negative Sign issue in Data
entry.content:
Hello,

When i am doing a multiplication for the field netwr with -1, am getting a negative sign at the right side of the value like 123.20- instead of -123.20  

Data netwr type WERTV8          ( Data type CURR, length 15, decimals 2)

netwr = netwr * -1. 

netwr = 123.20-

And i used a below function module to change the sign to the left side of the value but after that i am not able to move the exact value -123.20 to the netwr field (123.20- is displaying still in netwr).

          DATA amount_char TYPE char20.
          amount_char = lwa_comm-netwr.
          CALL FUNCTION 'CLOI_PUT_SIGN_IN_FRONT'
            CHANGING
              value = amount_char.

 netwr = amount_char.

Any suggestions please?
